job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: PeopleReign, the leading AI System of Intelligence for IT and HR employee service, is hiring the top software engineers on the planet.Ready to create products that will define how the next billion employees work? Ready to test your limits and learn from a world-class team? Ready to do the best work of your life?We need you.Join one of the hottest companies in one of the hottest spaces in enterprise software. We're hiring full-stack developers to partner with our team of Data Scientists, AI engineers, and linguists.Our SaaS platform is used by millions of employees around the world to get better IT and HR service at work. Customers routinely upgrade to PeopleReign from IBM Watson and Microsoft LUIS for better NLP, more accurate AI, and a fully automated data pipeline.ResponsibilitiesPartner with engineers and product teams to develop SaaS productsDeliver high-quality, data-driven features on timeLead architecture discussions and participate actively in design reviewsOwn the lifecycle of your code from unit testing to deployment to monitoringMaintain  RequirementsBachelor's degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science or related fieldDemonstrated success in high-growth, startup environmentsExceptional written and oral communication skillsAdvanced proficiency in coding (multiple languages including Python), databases, API design, cloud architectures (including AWS and Azure), frontend frameworks (including React, Vue, and Angular), integrationsAdvanced proficiency in git-based workflowsBonus: demonstrated success working with AI and data science frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn
